videos.overview: Mike and Frank use the force to uncover a secret Star Wars stash in California; the guys try to make a deal on a mint '56 Chevy Belair.

videos.title: Red, White and Blues
videos.overview: The guys unearth a music jackpot in an old general store, and a hoarder house holds on to its secrets.

videos.title: The Bundle Brothers
videos.overview: Two brothers are better than one when it comes to negotiating, which has Mike looking to bundle in order to save his bottom line.

videos.title: Space Oddities
videos.overview: Picking in New Mexico for the first time ever, the guys head straight to Roswell, but take a detour to a Wild West town with a million-dollar item for sale.

videos.title: Daredevil Duffey
videos.overview: A daredevil stuntman lives up to his legend in New Mexico and Mike looks for some divine intervention on a must-have pick.

videos.title: Law & Hoarder
videos.overview: A Texas attorney lays down the law by day and by night is a super picker with a wild warehouse of eclectic stuff.

videos.title: From Coupe to Nuts
videos.overview: Mike and Frank are unwelcome visitors while freestyling in the Northeast; rehabbing a rare and rusty '33 Ford Coupe.

videos.title: Coin-Op Kings
videos.overview: The guys discover the ultimate coin-op man cave hidden on a farm in upstate New York, and Frank hatches a plan to help lonely collectors find love.

videos.title: A Man's Home is His Castle
videos.overview: Mike and Frank pick a family that spent 40 years building their very own castle by hand, and a circus collector with a wax museum in his living room.

videos.title: Like Father, Like Daughter
videos.overview: A retired auctioneer and his daughter have haggling in their blood; Mike has eyes for a long-sought 1930s Cord convertible.

videos.title: Can't Catch a Break
videos.overview: While Mike makes deal after deal, Frank hits a road block with a straight-talking Wisconsin collector who won't budge on prices.

videos.title: The Superfan
videos.overview: Mike makes a big league offer on an ultra-rare vintage Edison invention, and a mega stash of beer-related memorabilia stokes Frank's Oktoberfest mojo.

videos.title: Oddities & Commodities
videos.overview: The guys brave a collection that sends chills up the spine at a former gas station transformed into an eccentric home.

videos.title: Beetle in a Haystack
videos.overview: A lead on an ultra-rare VW beetle turns out to be a true barn find, but it'll take a heavy metal move to bring it home.

videos.title: Have Yourself a Merry Pickers Christmas
videos.overview: Mike tries to get Frank into the Christmas spirit while exploring two super packed picks.

videos.title: Who's the Rarest of Them All?
videos.overview: The guys find themselves in Studebaker heaven, and visit a designer with the rarest collection in the Midwest.

videos.title: On the Road Again
videos.overview: Mike takes an epic Route 66 road trip in an antique convertible to bring the car back to the widow of its previous owner. But the 1930s classic may not make it through the 600 mile journey.

videos.title: What's Inside the Vault?
videos.overview: When the guys visit a woman overwhelmed by an incredible inheritance, she opens the doors to a secret vault. And they meet their match in an 80-year-old rebel who speeds a mini bike around his massive property.

videos.title: This One Stings
videos.overview: Mike makes a mistake in Indiana, and while the guys get a warm reception from a carnie collector in Ohio, the pick brings an unexpected sting.

videos.title: Full Speedo Ahead
videos.overview: The guys visit a man with a puzzling nickname who hasn't thrown away anything since the 1950s, and isn't willing to start now. And he isn't shy about flaunting his favorite underwear, which comes as a shock to Mike and Frank.

videos.title: Jersey's Jackpot
videos.overview: When the guys do a favor for a friend, what seems like a raw deal becomes a surprising win-win situation. Plus, they get behind a locked door that hasn't been opened in decades.

videos.title: A Few Good Junk Men
videos.overview: The guys stumble on the mother lode of Americana in Maryland. Then, a former garbage man's trash is a real treasure.

videos.title: Frank's Birthday
videos.overview: Frank celebrates his birthday with a picking bonanza. Plus, the guys make a woman's dream come true by brokering a deal to honor her deceased husband.

videos.title: Signs of Struggle
videos.overview: Mike struggles to free a massive vintage sign from a tight corner, then the guys strike an impossible deal with the "Sign Boss." Back in Iowa, Danielle joins Frank for a final joyride in a 1956 Chevy.

videos.title: A Colonel of Truth
videos.overview: The guys pick the collection of a reclusive and mysterious businessman named "the Colonel", who has gone to great lengths to keep his identity a secret.

videos.title: Tick Tock Pick
videos.overview: The guys go hog wild at a sprawling ranch in Texas, where Mike flips for a VW bus that's been transformed into a hunting lodge on wheels. Plus, Frank finds a storied heirloom that reignites a high school obsession.

videos.title: One Giant Pick for Mankind
videos.overview: The guys uncover a former firefighter's stockpile which includes an ultra-rare piece of Space Age history. Plus, Frank's plan goes up in smoke.

videos.title: Picked a Peck of Pepper
videos.overview: The guys go big in Texas with a mega pick at the first Dr. Pepper bottling plant, and tough negotiations in a 50,000 square-foot warehouse.

videos.title: Scrappy Go Lucky
videos.overview: The guys visit a hardcore collector in California who's under pressure from his County to downsize. Plus, a roadside hunch leads to a bonanza of rare vintage cars.

videos.title: No Stoner Left Unturned
videos.overview: The guys meet a man who had pieces on display in the Smithsonian, but find that what he's held on to is even more mind-blowing. And a father/daughter power struggle is a roadblock to picking a century farm.

videos.title: Slim Pickings
videos.overview: The guys visit a jaw-dropping Kentucky property with a racetrack that revives an old Mike & Frank rivalry. Later, a freestyle stop in North Carolina looks like a bust until they unearth a one-of-a-kind TV relic.

videos.title: Planes, Frames and Automobiles
videos.overview: In an antique shop closed since the 70s, Mike and Frank go toe-to-toe with the sibling owners who negotiate for every last dollar. And, the guys come upon a historic aircraft with an amazing backstory.

videos.title: The Joy of Sax
videos.overview: A garage door in Indiana leads to a 1950s wagon Mike can't leave without--if he can sweeten the deal. And on a musical mission from Dani, the guys scour a farm with more than chickens and pigs.

videos.title: Picker's Code
videos.overview: The guys get a lead from a fellow picker, but is he a friend or competitor? Then, the toughest obstacle is making a deal with "the Godfather of Junk".

videos.title: Another Brick in the Wall
videos.overview: The guys have an awkward encounter with the "King of the Gypsies", who has an incredible underground stash but insists he can't be bought.

videos.title: Bucking Bronco
videos.overview: The guys uncover a once-in-a-lifetime find, and must decide to go big or go home. Mike gets down-and-dirty to rescue an old piece from Mother Nature.

videos.title: Tough Nut to Crack
videos.overview: When Frank goes nuts for a century-old snack icon, he must decide if it's worth an unprecedented sum of money to take it home. Then, Mike falls hard for a Roaring Twenties roadster.

videos.title: Sgt. Picker's Lonely Hearts Club
videos.overview: At an old school drive-in, Mike and Danielle uncover a vintage reel of Beatles' footage that could be the only one of its kind.

videos.title: Bound for Badness
videos.overview: When a freestyle lands them on the doorstep of a former arms dealer and her Judo champion husband, the guys make a killer back-room deal.

videos.title: Twin at all Costs
videos.overview: On a family compound near NYC, Mike flips for the coin-op elephant in the room and a staggering collection of A-list mannequins leaves him speechless.

videos.title: Shocked and Loaded
videos.overview: The guys encounter a mad scientist who creates his own lightning and hypnotizes Frank.

videos.title: High Energy Crisis
videos.overview: The guys have their hands full with a high-strung super-collector who might bounce off the walls. Plus, Danielle lands in NYC for a high-stakes auction of rock legend memorabilia.

videos.title: Going Down?
videos.overview: If the guys can't get a mammoth 1929 Roadster safely down a decaying 100-year-old elevator they will be $20,000 in the hole. Plus, Mike uncovers a surprise when he hears hissing coming from beneath an out-of-control collection.

videos.title: The Greatest Pick on Earth
videos.overview: After a mammoth pick on a 25-acre homestead, the guys comb through the largest collection of sideshow memorabilia they've ever seen.

videos.title: Hidden in Plane Sight
videos.overview: The guys explore a stash of ultra-rare motorcycle parts found behind a secret wall, and they find the ultimate aviation collectible - a propeller linked to Charles Lindbergh.

videos.title: Hydro Homestead
videos.overview: The guys try to buy from a super-handyman on a unique homestead, but his deal-making could end the pick before it gets going.

videos.title: Time Warp
videos.overview: The guys are stunned by a house with storefronts frozen in time, containing a bounty of never-sold stock and a secret bootlegging basement.

videos.title: Concrete Jungle
videos.overview: The guys pick New York City for the first time ever, and go back to the future at a sprawling computer store packed with a mind-blowing stockpile of 20th century technological artifacts.

videos.title: Risks and Rewards
videos.overview: In Detroit, Frank takes a big risk on one of the greatest pieces he's ever seen. Plus, Mike acquires a Purple Heart along with a very special mission.

videos.title: Rock and a Hard Place
videos.overview: The guys get the pick of a lifetime behind the scenes at a famous tourist attraction, plus a collector in Cape Cod shuts down deal after deal until his wife steps in.

videos.title: Catch-32
videos.overview: The guys have their work cut out for them on a huge property with more custom '32 Fords than they have ever seen in one place, and Danielle attempts an important military mission.

videos.title: Beer Factor
videos.overview: In the heartland of beer, Frank is surprised to meet an old friend. Plus, the guys secretly prepare a surprise build for Danielle.

videos.title: Divide and Conquer
videos.overview: The guys double-team a packed property to find what they're looking for before nightfall. Plus, Mike discovers something living in the attic.

videos.title: The $90,000 Question
videos.overview: When they uncover one of the rarest motorcycles in the world, Mike and Frank must muster more cash than ever before to try and seal the ultimate deal.

videos.title: The Great Pumpkin Showdown
videos.overview: The guys put thousands on the line to strike a deal with a tough negotiator, and they meet Hubba, a rockabilly reverend with many talents.

videos.title: My Sweet Ford
videos.overview: Mike and Frank find a classic 33 Ford that's been sitting so long that a tree has grown around it. But nothing stops the guys from rescuing this rare ride.

videos.title: Hello Jell-O
videos.overview: Mike stumbles on a century-old Jell-O ice cream wagon worth thousands, and Robbie makes a huge offer on an iconic Ford.

videos.title: Tunnels and Treasures
videos.overview: While combing through a mind-blowing collection, Mike stares down the headlights of a rare Ford; and the guys pick a Tennessee home hiding a big secret.

videos.title: Something Weird Here
videos.overview: The guys are first in line to pick an incredible North Carolina collection of weird and wonderful circus and sideshow memorabilia.

videos.title: Hot Rod Hero
videos.overview: Mike and Frank discover an amazing fleet of one-of-a-kind concept cars. Some so unique they don't even know how to price them.

videos.title: Queen of Fortune
videos.overview: The picking gets red, hot and blue in a Louisiana warehouse as Mike makes a move on Gypsy Grandma, the queen of arcade games.

videos.title: Woody's Picking Paradise
videos.overview: It's a picking paradise as Mike and Frank come across a huge 200,000-square-foot factory turned private collection by Woody, its dumpster diving owner.

videos.title: Superhero Heaven
videos.overview: In a jam-packed home Mike and Frank find Superhero heaven when they come across a rare Superman comic plus the very first Spider-Man comic worth $50,000.

videos.title: American Dream
videos.overview: Mike and Frank roll up on a coin-op empire ruled by sisters ready to rumble for every penny.

videos.title: Mike's Big Buy
videos.overview: Mike and Frank are picking and dreaming in California. Then dreams become reality when Mike falls for the sweetest classic Ford pick-up he's ever seen.

videos.title: Real Knuckleheads
videos.overview: Frank falls hard for a rare Harley Davidson Knucklehead at a collectors hidden California compound.

videos.title: 40 Acre Pick
videos.overview: Plowing through a 40-acre salvage yard, Mike and Frank harvest a few lost treasures, including a never-before-seen farmer's mini-bike.

videos.title: Pedal Pushers
videos.overview: Just outside the nation's capital Mike and Frank find a stash of untouched inventory from one of the country's oldest bicycle and sporting goods store.

videos.title: Frank's Big Day
videos.overview: Frank jumps for joy as he and Mike pick a recently closed toy museum ready to sell their collection of treasures.

videos.title: Hyder's Hideaway
videos.overview: While freestyling in Virginia's Appalachian Mountains the guys come across a hidden hideaway filled with history and even some mementos from a bluegrass legend.

videos.title: Rat Rod Rolls
videos.overview: With a jam-packed farmhouse, killer barn, and rare rat rod Rolls Royce, a massive Ohio collection has mega-pick potential.

videos.title: The Mother Load
videos.overview: Mike and Frank accept a special invite from Indiana's Model-A Ford lady and fall hard for her ultra-rare barn-fresh Model-A tow truck.

videos.title: Double Bubble Trouble
videos.overview: Mike and Frank visit a hot rod mechanic with a super expensive collection of rare bubbletop cars.

videos.title: The Jersey Jaguar
videos.overview: Mike and Frank unleash a sleek 67 Jaguar in a New Jersey garage and later pick a general store with a Presidential past.

videos.title: Ripe for the Picking
videos.overview: Mike and Frank are in Napa Valley but rather than pick grapes they pick one of the largest wine-related collections in the world before the owner shouts "Last Call".

videos.title: Junkyard Wizard
videos.overview: A junkyard wizard has an Oktoberfest gem with Frank Fritz's name written all over it.

videos.title: Slam Dunk Junk
videos.overview: In Chicago, Mike and Frank find a massive warehouse filled with cast off treasures including some superstar sports memorabilia that are a total slam dunk.

videos.title: Adrenaline Junkie
videos.overview: The guys uncover toy cars worth as much as the real thing, and a stash of custom motorbikes with an incredible backstory.

videos.title: Cowzilla in Colorado
videos.overview: While Frank is on the mend, Mike and his brother Robbie crisscross Colorado and find a giant cow-shaped RV.

videos.title: One of Everything
videos.overview: Mike and Robbie uncover a hidden stash of awesome motorcycle relics at a Colorado property littered with massive man-mobiles.

videos.title: Ready to Roar
videos.overview: Mike and Frank meet Larry who has the ultimate big boy toys including a rare Porsche and a pair of unusual pick-ups that really get the guys going.

videos.title: Ready to Race
videos.overview: The guys are stoked to visit a former racer and adrenaline junkie in his vintage Ohio garage.

videos.title: Space Ranger
videos.overview: The guys head to Minnesota on a rescue mission to help save the remains of a carnival business from Mother Nature.

videos.title: Snow Job
videos.overview: In the middle of a Minnesota blizzard, Mike and Frank face the frost to uncover a rare pair of trucks on farmer Jim's spread.

videos.title: Frank's Folly
videos.overview: Mike and Danielle join an architectural salvage crew on a special mission while Robbie and Frank hunt for treasure in an old theater turned prop warehouse.

videos.title: Million-Dollar Cars
videos.overview: Mike and Frank find an important part for a million-dollar car.

videos.title: Big Money Racers
videos.overview: On a 100-acre property in Arkansas, Mike falls hard for a midget racecar with a Knucklehead motor and prize-winning pedigree.

videos.title: Texas Treasures
videos.overview: In the heart of oil country, a family's vintage service station is just like a petroliana museum where the awesome inventory is all off limits.

videos.title: Texas Pick'em
videos.overview: Mike and Frank are deep in the heart of Texas where they play a couple of hands of Texas Pick'em with some savvy collectors.

videos.title: Roll Like a Rock Star
videos.overview: When the guys get a lead on what could be Aerosmith's original tour van, they head out on a cross-country trek in search of the holy grail of rock'n'roll relics.

videos.title: Big Tennessee Welcome
videos.overview: In Nashville, Danielle introduces the guys to a former Chevy dealership that could provide an awesome new home base.

videos.title: Bubba Gump Picks
videos.overview: Mike and Frank are in Pickin' heaven when they come across a mammoth collection of militaria that includes Civil War revolvers and even Forrest Gump's original footlocker.

videos.title: Eyes on the Prize
videos.overview: While cruising through Florida, the guys go hog wild in a former juke joint-turned-picker's paradise.

videos.title: The Doctor is Waiting
videos.overview: Mike and Frank are scolded when they arrive late for an appointment with Dr. Fred. But once they get past his grumpy assistant, they find themselves in a strange world filled with all kinds of weird and wonderful things.

videos.title: Pickin' for the Fences
videos.overview: In Oklahoma, the guys uncover a baseball signed by one of the greatest players of all time.

videos.title: Mighty Micro-Madness
videos.overview: Mike has an epiphany in New Hampshire when he finds a mighty collection of microcars including one of the rarest in the world.

videos.title: One Wheel Deal
videos.overview: In Missouri, the guys visit an historic homestead where they join the search for grandpa's lost Civil War uniform.

videos.title: High Flying Pick
videos.overview: Lost for half a century, the guys heroically return a naval artifact to its rightful home in Washington, D.C.

videos.title: Hard Bargin Picks
videos.overview: While driving Route 66 in Kansas, the guys visit an old hanger packed with a jaw-dropping collection of vintage cars.

videos.title: Pickers Like It Hot
videos.overview: In Massachusetts, the guys try to broker a deal on an original Bowie Knife and discover a Hollywood collection with never seen photos of Marilyn Monroe the Frank goes gaga over.

videos.title: Pick Your Battle
videos.overview: Mike and Danielle pick an over-the-top, tiki-party-meets-rockabilly home while Frank and Robbie set their sights on a vast collection hidden in the fortified bunkers of an old army base.

videos.title: The Great Pick Off
videos.overview: The great pick-off continues as Mike and Danielle continue their team effort to take on Frank and Robbie for ultimate picking bragging rights.

videos.title: Picker's Dozen
videos.overview: A century-old Italian grocery store turned time capsule features an early 20th century delivery truck and a secret crypt that's calling Mike's name.

videos.title: Presidential Picks
videos.overview: The Pickers are on a Presidential Trail as Mike and Danielle head for Pennsylvania while Frank and Robbie are on a whistle stop tour of North Dakota.

videos.title: Pick Like a Honey Badger
videos.overview: Mike and Frank are itching to see what is inside a barn that has been off limits for a quarter of a century. And while Mike makes like a honey badger, bundle master Frank strikes again.

videos.title: Raiders of the Lost Pick
videos.overview: Mike and Danielle crawl into a Pittsburgh time capsule while Frank and Robbie plow through six generations of stuff on one of Michigan's oldest farms.

videos.title: Rock 'n' Roll Heaven
videos.overview: It's all Rock and Roll as the guys tackle the painstaking preservation of Aerosmith's original tour van while a star-struck Frank picks one of his teen idols.

videos.title: Pick This Way
videos.overview: Aerosmith's legendary tour van gets an overhaul just in time for a visit from Rock'n'Roll royalty.

videos.title: The Michigan Madman
videos.overview: The guys stumble upon two of the fastest motorcycles ever built and they are determined to save them from oblivion.

videos.title: The Mysterious Madame X
videos.overview: Mike and Mefford, the mechanic, are on the hunt for Madame X — a legendary one-of-a-kind 1929 Cadillac. But is it real?

videos.title: Space Invaders Smackdown
videos.overview: The guys are ready to light up the sky when they pick a Detroit warehouse packed with vintage searchlights. Then Frank risks everything on a game of Space Invaders.

videos.title: Frank Meet Brank
videos.overview: The guys have high hopes when they uncover a sexy 1935 Auburn roadster on an Indiana farm, but end up with just a kiddie ride instead.

videos.title: Van-Tastic
videos.overview: The boys uncover a treasure trove of VW buses in Arkansas, and with the collection under threat from vandals, Mike is determined to rescue as many as possible.

videos.title: Corvette King
videos.overview: The guys visit a gas pump graveyard in Louisiana while Danielle finds a home for a pair of historic drag bikes.

videos.title: Alabama Rolls
videos.overview: An Alabama couple has one of the biggest collections the guys have ever come across, including a number of high-octane cars saved from the scrap heap.

videos.title: Aerosmith Van
videos.overview: After picking an awesome surf museum in California, Mike and Frank catch up with the Aerosmith van in Vegas. Then drive it down the strip to meet their rock 'n' roll idols for the big reveal.

videos.title: Georgia on My Mind
videos.overview: Mike and Frank hightail it to Georgia hoping to snap up a super rare roadster and get it back on the highway.

videos.title: Double DeLorean Delight
videos.overview: On a ramshackle New Jersey estate, Mike and Danielle go on a Back-to-the Future joyride in a DeLorean.

videos.title: Freaky Florida
videos.overview: In a freaky Florida town steeped with Carnival history. Mike gambles big on the mother lode of must-have circus banners.

videos.title: California Pickers
videos.overview: In the mountains of Southern California, the guys start their pick in an old train caboose and make off with a bulging bounty of cool old signs.

videos.title: Say Sohio
videos.overview: Frank falls super hard for a 63 Corvette Stingray and he keeps raising his offer that it makes Robbie wonder if this is really Frank. Meanwhile Mike and Mefford kick off an ambitious restoration project.

videos.title: Hollywood Honey Hole
videos.overview: The guys find a Hollywood honey hole when they meet a stuntman from Hollywood's Golden Age; Al's California garage is overflowing with mind-blowing memorabilia.

videos.title: Knucklehead Frank
videos.overview: In Southern California, Frank gets a lesson in Knucklehead Zen when the guys visit Andy, a kindred spirit and international man of mystery.

videos.title: Tick Tock Frank
videos.overview: Frank "tick-tock" Fritz is over the moon when the guys pick a Portland clock shop that's a showcase for vintage mechanical wonders of all kinds.

videos.title: Picking Through the Ashes
videos.overview: At an historic Oregon flour mill, the guys tour the site of a massive restoration project and pick up some awesome items that will help in the rebuilding.

videos.title: Jolene, Jolene
videos.overview: An old walnut farm in California has barns that have not seen the light of day in years and just might contain the Holy Grail of vintage workwear.

videos.title: Dani Goes East
videos.overview: It's tattoo mania in New York as Mike and Danielle pick through an artist's high-end collection of flash art. Then Mike uncovers a 100-year-old Papier-Mâché Uncle Sam. In Ohio, Frank and Robbie bumble through four stories of junk in search of hidden treasures.

videos.title: Double Barn Bonanza
videos.overview: In rural New York, the guys dive into back-to-back epic picks where the incredible collections tell the story of America.

videos.title: Wolves in Picker's Clothes
videos.overview: Mike and Robbie are trying to tackle a trio of vintage Fords but their sibling rivalry threatens to blow up the deal.

videos.title: Mr. Whizzer
videos.overview: Honoring their late father and his massive stockpile of rusty gold, two sisters in Upstate New York invite the guys to pick through Dad's epic untouched garage.

videos.title: A Bronx Tale
videos.overview: From a storied boatyard in the Bronx to an untouched 1970's mancave in Oregon, the guys tackle two mind-blowing bicoastal picks.

videos.title: Dani's Picker-versary
videos.overview: Danielle's 10th anniversary with Antique Archaeology becomes a surprise party for Mike when she turns the milestone into a major league event complete with a Hollywood ending.

videos.title: Midwest Mayhem
videos.overview: A supersize Chicago machine shop leaves the boys breathless while Danielle and Robbie search for curios at an Odd Fellows Home-turned-winery.

videos.title: Pickin' Safari
videos.overview: Teeming with taxidermy, Ron's Illinois home is like Pet Sematary meets the Natural History Museum.

videos.title: Motor Mania
videos.overview: When the guys are wowed by an epic Iowa collection of classic cars and motorbikes, Danielle and Robbie hail Milwaukee's king of coin-op.

videos.title: Back Road Buys
videos.overview: Mike and Frank hit a down and dirty old-school pick in Illinois while Danielle and Robbie enjoy a high-speed joyride in a one-of-a-kind rat rod.

videos.title: Burlesque Queen
videos.overview: In Illinois, Mike and Frank comb through a mind-blowing historic marina while in Kansas City, Danielle brokers a deal on the mother of all burlesque collections.

videos.title: Cruisin'
videos.overview: Mike and Dave go hog wild for a former Minnesota car dealership that's now home to scores of dusty projects and a one-of-a-kind miniature cruise ship.

videos.title: Young Grasshopper
videos.overview: In Minnesota, the founder of Memoryville opens the doors to his vintage wonderland while Mefford-the-mechanic has an update on the legendary Madame X Cadillac.

videos.title: Chopper King
videos.overview: A jaw-dropping Arizona property features antique motorbikes as far as the eye can see, and in Tennessee, an ultra-rare Zephyr gets a tire-blowing test drive.

videos.title: The Ghost of the West
videos.overview: In New Mexico, Mike and Danielle make an epic stagecoach stop and visit a frozen-in-time adobe village complete with ghost stories and a Wild West saloon.

videos.title: Moonshine and Motors
videos.overview: Steeped in moonshine, bluegrass and drag racing, Bobby's seven-generation Georgia homestead offers Southern picking at its finest.

videos.title: Georgia Wonderland
videos.overview: While Robbie crosses the Rockies with a legendary car in tow, Mike and Mefford go for a high-speed joyride in a banned badass muscle car without brakes.

videos.title: Zephyrville
videos.overview: In Florida, Mike meets a gun-slinging cowboy who reels him in with tales from the golden age of Hollywood westerns.

videos.title: Desert Gold Rush
videos.overview: It's a banner day in Arizona with back-to-back picks featuring a late artist's one-of-a-kind collection and a jaw-dropping stash of vintage hi-fi.

videos.title: Pumps, Prints and Picks
videos.overview: Mike and Jersey Jon dive into a century-old Connecticut print shop while Robbie and Danielle unearth a rare globe at a 1920s truck stop.

videos.title: Hidden Harley
videos.overview: An historic New Hampshire farm features 300 years of forgotten treasures, and in Pennsylvania, Robbie finds a 1936 Harley hiding in plain sight.

videos.title: Smoking Hot Chevy
videos.overview: In Florida, Mike and Mefford home in on an immaculate 1964 Chevy pickup and uncover a circus scrapbook with never-before-seen photos of Elvis.

videos.title: Country Queen
videos.overview: In Tennessee, Mike meets one of the giants of country music history, while Robbie and Danielle uncover a barn-fresh Impala at the perfect Pennsylvania pick.

videos.title: Burgers and Ballrooms
videos.overview: Mike finds the world's most famous hamburger icon in a Massachusetts chicken coop while Danielle dances through history at a defunct 1940s studio turned time capsule.

videos.title: Bombshells and Silk
videos.overview: Mike and Jersey John visit a prolific Cape Cod collector while Danielle and Robbie uncover amazing American souvenirs and Queen Victoria's silk stockings in Pennsylvania.

videos.title: Brothers and Burlesque
videos.overview: Mike and Robbie go wild for a killer main street pick in Tennessee while Danielle visits Cleveland's queen of burlesque to close the deal on a racy piece of history.

videos.title: Hollywood Hot Rods
videos.overview: Mike and Dave scour a visionary collector's stash of amusement park relics while Danielle and Robbie visit a jaw-dropping line-up of original Hollywood hotrods.

videos.title: A Record Deal
videos.overview: Mike and Jersey Jon scour a massive family stockpile in Connecticut while Danielle and Robbie uncover an ultra-rare Beatles memento in a jam-packed Pennsylvania home.

videos.title: Rock 'n Go
videos.overview: Mike uncovers a stockpile of vintage relics from a time when toys could kill, and Danielle breaks a sweat over a trunk of ultra-rare concert tees worth their weight in gold.

videos.title: Hollywood in Texas
videos.overview: In Texas, Retro Rick opens the doors to his stockpile of Hollywood relics. And, Robbie is determined to reunite two halves of an ultra-rare gas globe.

videos.title: Big Tex
videos.overview: Cruising through the Lone Star State, the Wolfe brothers visit a one-of-a-kind home that was custom-built around a staggering Texas-size collection.

videos.title: Fort Knox of Toys
videos.overview: The Wolfe brothers go nuts when junkyard Ron opens the doors to his jaw-dropping Fort Knox of high-end toys near Dallas, and Mike hones in on the Holy Grail of VWs in Ohio.

videos.title: Picking Nirvana
videos.overview: In Ohio, a late friend's picking nirvana has the Wolfe brothers howling. With a successful demolition business and an eye for treasure, Brian amassed a mind-boggling collection of rare oversize gems. And, honoring both his memory and his wife, the brothers drop big money pieces that tell the story of America. Meanwhile, back in Tennessee, Mefford calls in the experts for a killer paint job on the shop's exterior.

videos.title: Return of the Impala
videos.overview: Mike and Danielle geek out over a collection of oddball antiques in Ohio while a thrilling joyride in his new vintage Impala leaves Robbie stranded.

videos.title: Racy Relics
videos.overview: Mike and Jersey John fall hard for a grand South Carolina home while Danielle scores a few racy relics in Mississippi.

videos.title: Fiddles and Picks
videos.overview: Mike and Jersey Jon hone in on some big-money picks in North Carolina, while Danielle and Robbie meet a legendary bluegrass fiddler who has an awesome Nashville collection.

videos.title: Paradise Picking
videos.overview: Robbie gets revved up for a time-travel bike in Mississippi, and Mike unearths a barn-fresh 1932 pickup in North Carolina that hasn't seen the light of day in 50 years.

videos.title: Secrets of the Hotel
videos.overview: For Mike and Jersey Jon, the deals are flying in a North Carolina garage. Meanwhile Danielle and Robbie uncover the celebrated history of a legendary Kentucky hotel.

videos.title: Radioactive Rust
videos.overview: A retired Air Force general reveals the story of his American Dream. Meanwhile Robbie and Danielle are dazzled by the glow of a rare collection of radioactive glass.

videos.title: Homestead Honey Hole
videos.overview: The Wolfe brothers tour a massive West Virginia homestead complete with an antique auto showroom. And in Texas, an ex-drag racer with a mountain of petroliana is in the mood to sell.

videos.title: Coal Gold
videos.overview: In West Virginia, the Wolfe brothers pick a century-old soda shop that's frozen in time. And a Methodist minister and circus ringleader opens the doors to his eye-popping collection.

videos.title: Joyridin' Pick
videos.overview: A Maryland car fanatic opens the doors to his late father's massive collection; after Robbie takes a joyride back to the '70s, Mike revs up a retro British taxi.

videos.title: Skateboards and Gutter Balls
videos.overview: A California almond farm serves up a hidden stash of retro surf shop relics, and a Prohibition-era bowling alley in L.A. offers a mind-blowing trip back in time.

videos.title: Country Road Gold
videos.overview: Mike and Robbie visit an old-school general store filled with country road gold. And a serious collector opens the doors to his empire of vintage coin-op scales.

videos.title: Movie Magic Picking
videos.overview: Mike, and Robbie head for the Hollywood Hills to pick a once-in-a-lifetime stockpile of amazing movie memorabilia.

videos.title: The King of Signs
videos.overview: Robbie unveils his sprawling retro garage, and in Southern California, the Wolfe brothers come face-to-face with the King of Signs and uncover the Holy Grail of 3D signs.

videos.title: Cadillac Man
videos.overview: The Wolfe brothers uncover an overgrown vintage Cadillac graveyard in the woods, and peel back the layers of a gargantuan California stockpile.

videos.title: Picking Frisco
videos.overview: The Wolfe brothers drop in on an historic San Francisco hotel that's home to an awesome collection of classic cars and uncover a hidden stash of spooky carnival relics.

videos.title: Picture Perfect Pick
videos.overview: In the California desert, the Wolfe brothers comb through a late photographer's eclectic hide-away and enter a sprawling ranch that's home to a must-have holy neon beacon.

videos.title: High Speed Picking
videos.overview: Mike visits the Virginia birthplace of a high-speed camera that changed the world. Meanwhile in Nashville, a music guru has some sobering news about Danielle's rock'n'roll gamble.

videos.title: Pinball Jack
videos.overview: In the heart of beer country, the Wolfe brothers find the motherlode of breweriana, the granddaddy of all pinball machines, and Elvis inside a Milwaukee collector's suburban home. Down the road, Mike and Robbie make a return pilgrimage to an Illinois honey hole to dig through five generations of history in a century-old mansion full of treasure.

videos.title: Wolves in Wisconsin
videos.overview: On Uncle Butch's ten-acre homestead in Wisconsin, the Wolfe brothers pay big money for some rare nuggets of petroliana but strike out on a jaw-dropping ride with a Hollywood pedigree. Flying solo in Milwaukee, Mike meets the 97-year-old inventor whose life-like automatons tell the story of America's all-time favorite characters.

videos.title: Searching in Selma
videos.overview: Mike and Jersey uncover a massive collection of petroliana in Alabama while Dani and Robbie hit an Arizona property with killer steam engines as far as the eye can see.

videos.title: Shelby in the Barn
videos.overview: In Alabama, Mike goes hog wild for a super-rare, barn-fresh Shelby Mustang while Dani and Robbie visit a New Mexico town that's determined to remain a roadside attraction.

videos.title: Rocket Ray Round-Up
videos.overview: A Wisconsin collector's oversize storage units feature a variety of items; a former drag racer opens the doors to his museum-quality stockpile of petroliana featuring homemade engine cutaways, a stable full of early Chevrolets and a must-have pickup.

videos.title: Pool Hall Picking
videos.overview: In Louisiana, a seasoned collector and his grandson open the doors to a pool hall-turned-catch-all where Mike uncovers an ultra-rare pinball machine; in Mississippi, Robbie and Jersey scour an epic property with tons of outbuildings.

videos.title: Flea Market Junkie
videos.overview: Mike and Jersey visit a flea market junkie in Louisiana while Robbie and Danielle scour a jam-packed Arizona property where nearly everything is for sale.

videos.title: The Alabama Slamma
videos.overview: A mind-blowing Alabama collection includes a century of salvage; in Mississippi, Robbie dives into the remains of a family's carnival empire.

videos.title: Knucklehead Blue
videos.overview: Mike uncovers a mind-blowing collection of vintage baseball cards in Kansas; Robbie and Jersey try to broker a deal in Tommy's "black hole of stuff."

videos.title: Big Bucks Bubbles
videos.overview: Mike makes a return pilgrimage to Rick's Michigan honey hole. And this time he's determined to seal the deal on a ratty t-shirt and futuristic one-of-a-kind bubble car--no matter how big the price tag. Down the road, Robbie and Jersey comb through a late collector's sprawling workshop where everything is ups for grabs including a bright green dune buggy.

videos.title: The Wizard's Castle
videos.overview: In the thumb of Michigan, a homeowner's inventive great granddad left behind a cutting-edge property complete with a custom zip line, water park, and private speakeasy; at a defunct museum down the road, Danielle closes in on a claw-foot bathtub.

videos.title: Naughty and Nice
videos.overview: Mike and Danielle scour a sensory-overload attic in Detroit; Jersey and Robbie follow a random lead to a late collector's mighty stockpile.

videos.title: Picking Larry Land
videos.overview: In Nebraska, the Wolfe brothers comb through Larry Land--an epic 27,000-square-foot hangar full of choice coin-op, carnival relics and more. The good news is that owner Larry is ready to make a deal. Down the road in Kansas, Mike-the-veterinarian has filled the house next door with all kinds of treasures that boggles the mind.

videos.title: Jack is Back
videos.overview: In Detroit, rock 'n' roll legend Jack White unveils his needle-in-a-haystack quest to track down a historic one-of-a-kind recording trailer that's been AWOL for decades.

videos.title: Small Towns, Big Picking
videos.overview: A Pennsylvania preservationist opens the doors to his jaw-dropping historic properties; the Wolfe brothers sift through a rockstar picker's off-limits collection.

videos.title: Wolfes Go West
videos.overview: In Nebraska, the Wolfe brothers visit a third-generation pioneer village that features a visionary's mighty collection--along with a dozen massive outbuildings that haven't been opened since the 50s. Packed with planes, trains, automobiles--and everything in between--as Mike and Robbie go on a wild ride, unearthing dusty museum-quality surplus and long-forgotten pieces of choice Americana.

videos.title: Corvette Me Not
videos.overview: It's a scavenger hunt for Mike as he excavates a barn-fresh classic Corvette. Meanwhile, Robbie and Jersey sift through 150 years of history on a Michigan family farm.

videos.title: $135,000 Pick
videos.overview: In Michigan, a late collector's home features a stockpile of awesome wheels. And a wide-eyed Mike comes up with a staggering six-figure offer--the largest in American Pickers history--to take home five ultra-rare motorbikes. Meanwhile, Danielle nails a shot-in-the-dark mission for rock'n'roll legend Jack White and then it's up to Robbie and Dave to transport a legendary recording trailer to its new home in Detroit.

videos.title: Junkyard Jewels
videos.overview: Robbie and Jersey comb through a homewrecker's massive cache of architectural salvage, and Mike is determined to rescue a trio of dented Porsches.

videos.title: Gladiators of the Track
videos.overview: In Pittsburgh, a real-life heavy metal hero reveals his mind-boggling stockpile. And in Tennessee, the team revs up for a white-knuckle winner-takes-all go-kart smackdown.

videos.title: It's a Woody
videos.overview: Robbie is determined to buy the granddaddy of woody trailers, and Mike turns to one of the best mechanics in the country to breathe life into a bundle of ultra-rare Harleys and Indians

videos.title: Detroit Dreaming
videos.overview: At Detroit's abandoned Packard plant, Mike gets a tour of an American landmark before it disappears. And in Buffalo, Retro Ron's collection features the Holy Grail of vintage bikes.

videos.title: Little Shop of Wonders
videos.overview: Mike and Jersey pick a little shop of wonder in the heart of Manhattan. And Robbie chases down the holy grail of brass-era signs.

videos.title: Prince of the Subway
videos.overview: Mike tries pole dancing when a dumpster-diving artist invites him in. And Robbie and Jersey uncover a bonanza of antique signs from the NYC subway.

videos.title: Baron of the Skies
videos.overview: The Wolfe brothers seal the deal on a one-of-a-kind bi-plane. And an appraiser has good news--and bad news--about a pricey Wild West impulse purchase.

videos.title: Mega Pick Madness
videos.overview: Junk drunk on a hotly anticipated return visit to a legendary Florida collector, Mike picks up a mind-blowing piece of Civil Rights history and a to-die-for Schwinn Paramount with an heroic cross-country pedigree. Meanwhile in California, Robbie and Jersey are determined to seal the deal on a folk-art masterpiece of America's most iconic landmark.

videos.title: Kingdom of Lost Junk
videos.overview: The owner of an automotive boneyard is in the mood to sell. And a California collector's kingdom of junk is home to one of the rarest motorbikes in the world.

videos.title: Beware of Deere
videos.overview: In Michigan, Danielle falls for a collection of John Deere toys. And in Niagara Falls, three sisters open the doors to their late father's antique time capsule.

videos.title: King of Salvage
videos.overview: In the Pacific Northwest, the Wolfe Brothers are on the loose and get inside the salvage king's huge 200,000 square foot fortress-like warehouse filled with all kinds of treasures.

videos.title: Picking the Godfather
videos.overview: The Pacific Northwest is a picking paradise as Mike crashes into the godfather of Italian scooters while Robbie and Jersey nearly drown in a sea of smalls.

videos.title: Classic Car Cemetary
videos.overview: In South Carolina, the Wolfe brothers pick a main street grocery that's frozen in time, and pay a visit to Sammy's classic car paradise.

videos.title: Hidden Car Stash
videos.overview: Mike and Jersey go hog wild over a West Virginia honey hole, and Danielle uncovers a stash of cash in a hidden compartment.

videos.title: Mike and Homer
videos.overview: While cruising through Southern California on a special mission for Danielle, Mike uncovers a legendary signed guitar along with story boards and scripts from America's favorite cartoon family, The Simpsons. Clear across the country, Robbie and Jersey dive into a massive stockpile of vintage electronics--and honor a late North Carolina collector's legacy in the process.

videos.title: Picking Against Time
videos.overview: On the hunt for a delectable Porsche, Mike speed-picks in South Carolina while Rob and Jersey visit a motel-size collection of petroliana.

videos.title: Kiddie Car Heaven
videos.overview: Mike stumbles on a once-in-a-lifetime camera collection in upstate New York. And Robbie goes hog wild for a massive stash of junior dream cars.

videos.title: The Five-Generation Pick
videos.overview: Mike visits a time-capsule drugstore in Indiana, and Robbie and Jersey comb through a five-generation farmstead in West Virginia.

videos.title: The Mile-Long Yard Sale
videos.overview: Mike and Jersey trip out over an Oddfellow's Lodge in Maryland, and visit one man's combination theme park, art installation and roadside attraction.

videos.title: The Eyes Have It
videos.overview: In North Carolina, Mike, and Jersey dive into a mad-scientist collection of antique quackery and medical equipment--all curated by Richard, a retired eye surgeon in his 90s. Down the road in California, Larry's barn features a multi-generational stockpile of delicious vintage motorbikes, cars, and leather gear, but the trick is getting him to sell.

videos.title: Roadside Relics
videos.overview: Mike uncovers a Godzilla-size stockpile of vintage movie posters, and Robbie pays up for a pair of ultra-rare Chevy signs for the shop in Tennessee.

videos.title: Tough as Nails
videos.overview: Jody's late father left behind a supersized Ohio collection that includes, five hangars, a Ferris wheel, and a steamboat--and after years of careful negotiation, this tough-as-nails negotiator is finally ready to make a deal. Down the road, the Wolfe brothers help rescue a vintage car at a third-generation auto shop in Georgia that's been devastated by back-to-back fires.

videos.title: The Boneyard
videos.overview: While combing through his buddy's bad-to-the-bone boneyard in Cleveland, Mike uncovers a massive stash of brass-era bikes--and is determined to buy them all. Meanwhile, during an Illinois heat wave, Robbie and Jersey are the first to wade through a late collector's stockpile of early tools and the machines that built America.

videos.title: Farm Fresh
videos.overview: With a fleet of pricey cars and barns exploding with top-notch treasures, Mike and Robbie have high hopes for a sprawling family farm in Ohio. Down the road in West Virginia, the Wolfe brothers pick the scratch-and-dent room of Clifford's automobile museum--a small-town operation with big ambitions

videos.title: Knockout Salvage
videos.overview: Flying solo in Wisconsin, Mike gets VIP access to a legendary race car driver's vast collection of motorbikes and memorabilia and is determined to drive away with one of his prized two-wheelers. Down the road in Minnesota, Robbie and Jersey help an overwhelmed collector thin out his stockpile of knockout signs and architectural salvage.

videos.title: Runaway Train
videos.overview: In Illinois, Robbie and Jersey get exclusive access to a former race car driver's stockpile where they uncover rare car parts, pristine toys, and epic stories from the racetrack. Down the road, Mike falls hard for a small-town Wisconsin train museum where he scours the scratch-and-dent department for a good cause.

videos.title: Motorcycle Mancave
videos.overview: It's a meeting of the minds in Illinois as Mike picks a three-generation family business where the prolific collector's granddaughter knows the backstory of every single item. Down the road--at a motorbike enthusiast's mancave--Robbie pays up for a practice bomb and Jersey steps in to preserve a legendary racer's legacy.

videos.title: Evel Empire
videos.overview: From a Michigan man who was there, Mike learns about Evel Knievel's rocket-powered Snake Canyon jump--and is determined to buy a one-of-a-kind billboard rescued from the site. In Minnesota, Jersey and Robbie battle the summer heat as they rummage through a late car-lover's massive stockpile.

videos.title: Wolfemen vs The Automatons
videos.overview: On a California dream pick, the competitive pinball-wizard Wolfe brothers meet coin-op king Dirk at his giant poultry barn turned private arcade. Mike and Robbie enter a huge hangar full of ultra-rare games and choice carnival relics and find Dirk's prepared to sell off his massive collection to make way for a new passion--collecting classic roadside attractions.

videos.title: The Great Razooly
videos.overview: Flying solo, Mike heads to the California castle home of the Great Razooly--a sculptor, entrepreneur, and horror icon whose one-of-a-kind collection includes monsters, gargoyles, and a custom rocket ship on the front lawn. Down the road in backwoods Maine, Robbie and Jersey visit Jack's garage where the petroliana is hot and the picking is easy.

videos.title: The DIY DeLorean
videos.overview: Mike meets a kindred spirit at a defunct Wisconsin railroad town and uncovers vintage treasures and new old stock in a jaw-dropping space that's frozen in time. Meanwhile in Illinois, Robbie becomes obsessed with getting a one-of-a-kind DeLorean knockoff back on the road.

videos.title: Carnival Cash Out
videos.overview: In Minnesota, Mike and Jersey go hog wild for a four-generation carny collection complete with carousel horses, toy tanks and bumper cars. Down the road in New Hampshire--on a special mission for Robbie--the guys head to Roger's analog laboratory where the prices are off the charts, but so is Robbie's offer to buy a 20-foot one-of-a-kind swimming lady.

videos.title: Pickin' Wall-to-Wall
videos.overview: Mike meets a passionate Connecticut picker with major inventory--but getting access to his collection means dismantling a massive, layered wall of stuff. Meanwhile, clear across the country, Robbie and Jersey comb through a California collector's old-timey General Store, complete with one-of-a-kind displays and just about every vintage item under the sun.

videos.title: Surf, Signs, Salvage
videos.overview: On the coast of Southern California, Mike is hot for a bonanza of out-of-reach surfboards and rare signs--but he'll have to dismantle the garage to get at them. Down the road in Vermont, Robbie and Jersey visit an historic homestead complete with a killer observatory and rusty classic cars as far as the eye can see.

videos.title: The Toy Godfather
videos.overview: On Chicago's North Side, Mike and Jersey get VIP access to a sprawling historic home that features four floors of dazzling high-end antique toys. It's an eye-popping, once-in-a-lifetime opportunity. And though collector Lou says he's ready to pare down his stock, striking a deal will take patience, luck and climbing the stairs.

videos.title: Speedway Thrills
videos.overview: In Arizona, Mike relives the thrill of speedway history thanks to a motorbike-loving family of adrenaline junkies and their garage full of one-of-a-kind racing mementos. Down the road in Georgia, Robbie and Jersey shake hands with visionary 'body man' Bill and scour a bad-to-the-bone collection that includes a vintage diner, a coin-op Porky ride, and a hand-built wooden Jeep.

videos.title: Wizard of Odds
videos.overview: While on a doomed special mission for Mike in Florida, Robbie and Jersey pick through a mechanical wizard's jaw-dropping stockpile of petroliana and drag-race memorabilia. Down the road in California, Mike sidles up to a one-of-a-kind family heirloom--a mint-condition Harley three-wheeler whose story is as powerful as the piece itself.

videos.title: Legendary Find
videos.overview: In the sprawling basement of a legendary classic car showroom in Connecticut, Mike and Jersey pick through a monster lifetime collection. But the thrill of the chase is nothing compared to a joyride in a flame-shooting 1908 Locomobile. Down the road--at a dazzling 1950s gas station in Georgia--Robbie shifts gears when a first-time seller says he's prepared to make a deal.

videos.title: Junkyard Jamboree
videos.overview: In Alabama, Robbie and Jersey go hog wild for Edd's classic car collection and bad-to-the-bone boneyard—but he's reluctant to let anything go. Mike has a once-in-a-lifetime brush with country music stardom as he combs through the dazzling belongings of the legendary Hank Williams Jr.

videos.title: Gavel to Gravel
videos.overview: In L.A., Mike and Robbie head back to a fifth-generation demo business and junkyard that's piled so deep that most of its treasures are out of reach. Down the road in Florida, the `Judge' plays mind games as the Wolfe brothers sift through his monumental collection of petroliana and rusty gold.

videos.title: The Big Mack
videos.overview: At a four-generation family homestead in Illinois, Mike uncovers the mother lode of saloon relics and gambles big money on an ultra-rare slot machine. Down the road in Vermont, Robbie and Jersey try to broker a deal with a Mack truck fanatic who's keeping a tight grip on his prized possessions.

videos.title: Turbo Pick
videos.overview: Mike and Jersey turbo-pick a mint-condition stockpile in Tennessee and then--in Kentucky--unearth a bonanza of vintage treasures at a 1950s drive-in.

videos.title: Field of Finds
videos.overview: For the first time ever, Mike puts trusted mechanic Dave in the driver's seat for a once-in-a-lifetime baseball card pick.

videos.title: The Road to Relics
videos.overview: Mike and Jersey go wild for an eclectic Kentucky stockpile. And, Mike steps up with a high-flying bid for the Holy Grail of vintage motorbikes.

videos.title: No Instructions Needed
videos.overview: Mike and Jersey sift through a tidal wave of early technology, and Robbie is determined to rev up a one-of-a-kind car with no owner's manual.

videos.title: Lieutenants and Legends
videos.overview: Mike relives the thrill of stuntman Evel Knievel's legendary career while Robbie and Jersey comb through a stockpile of military relics.

videos.title: Picking Giants
videos.overview: Jersey chases his steam-powered boyhood dream. And Robbie visits a renowned artist in the kingdom of fiberglass giants.

videos.title: Buying Bonanza
videos.overview: Mike and Robbie revisit the picking grandpa they never had on his five-acre Kansas empire. And then head to Pennsylvania for a dizzying joyride.

videos.title: Two-Wheeled Treasures
videos.overview: Mike nails a double deal at an epic Utah motorcycle museum. Robbie and Jersey scour a shuttered family museum that hasn't been touched in decades.

videos.title: Hangar Hijinks
videos.overview: An Alabama airplane hangar is packed with medical quackery, and Mike and Jersey go wild for a legendary collection of super-rare motorbikes.

videos.title: Popcorn Pickin'
videos.overview: A first-time seller opens the doors to his time-capsule general store. Meanwhile, Mike pays a return visit to a Hollywood legend.

videos.title: Rockin' Relics
videos.overview: Mike visits legendary lead guitarist and collector James Burton at his Shreveport estate, and Robbie and Jersey pick a late letter carrier's cathedral of junk.

videos.title: Sign of the Times
videos.overview: A Kentucky roadside attraction is packed with rare signs. In Louisiana, bundle-master Mike helps Robbie seal the deal on a time-capsule truck.
